SEARCH
Package model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
model.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents a player in the Bear game. It holds a Bear object, an Inventory object, and the player's score. It also tracks session time and provides methods to manage the player's game progress.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(Bear bear)
    Constructs a Player object with a given Bear object and initializes an empty Inventory and score.

      Parameters:
      item - The item to be added to the inventory.

    • useItem

      public void useItem(String item)
      Uses an item from the player's inventory. The item must be in the inventory to be used.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be used.

    • startSession

      Starts a new session and tracks the session's start time.

    • endSession

      public void endSession()
      Ends the current session and updates the total session time.

    • getTotalSessionTime

      public long getTotalSessionTime()
      Gets the total session time accumulated across all sessions.
      Returns:
      The total session time in milliseconds.
